tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CharacterBehavior (
 character_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 behavior_type VARCHAR(255),
 behavior_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE character_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    action_description TEXT,
    character_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (character_id) REFERENCES character_data(character_id)
);

CREATE TABLE character_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    character_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    log_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (character_id) REFERENCES character_data(character_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES character_actions(action_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VirtualCharacter (
    character_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE CharacterActions (
    action_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    character_id UUID REFERENCES VirtualCharacter(character_id),
    action_name VARCHAR(50),
    action_type VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
